name: sigap-malut-backend
description: Backend API untuk SIGAP Malut - Sistem Informasi Terintegrasi Dinas Pangan Maluku Utara

scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:schema && npm run generate:models && npm run generate:controllers && npm run generate:routes && npm run generate:route-index
scripts.seed:master-direct: cross-env DB_DIALECT=sqlite DB_STORAGE=database/database.sqlite NODE_ENV=development node database/migrations/migrate.js && cross-env DB_DIALECT=sqlite DB_STORAGE=database/database.sqlite NODE_ENV=development node scripts/runMasterSeederDirect.mjs
scripts.test:ci: cross-env DB_DIALECT=sqlite DB_STORAGE=backend/tests/test.sqlite NODE_ENV=test npm run test
